item.title: Collecting Lenses to See the World
item.description: Life doesn’t make sense, and it never will. (WIP)

item.title: First Snorkeling Day Trip
item.description: I’ve always wanted to try diving or snorkeling in the ocean. I like pretty things and I’ve seen pictures of the beautiful underwater world. But I also had quite a bit of fear towards the deep sea. So recently, I decided to join StudyPerth for a snorkeling day trip to face my fears and experience something new. Early in the morning, we gathered at StudyPerth Student Hub for an attendance check.

item.title: How I Learnt to Embrace Emptiness
item.description: Have you ever found yourself wondering why you’re writing something? Or questioning your ability to write at all? Do you feel like you have nothing to write about, or that you’re not sure why you even want to write in the first place? These thoughts, combined with a feeling of emptiness, are something I’ve experienced more than a few times in my life. Emptiness can be characterized by emotional numbness, a lack of purpose and meaning, feeling disconnected, and acting mechanically or without enthusiasm.
